text:
Augustin Pascal Pierre Louis Marie de Romanet, Comte de Beaune (born 2 April 1961) is a French political advisor and business executive, chief executive officer of Groupe ADP since November 2012. He was the chairman of the Caisse des dépôts et consignations from 2007 to 2012, and held many government positions between 1986 and 2006.
In March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, he tested positive for the virus.
